message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. Would you like to buy it from me for $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I believe I can offer you $100 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Alice, I understand your position. I would like to counter with $103 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can do $108 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $107 for the product.
I'm getting a bit closer to your price, Bob! I can do $109 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Alice, I am willing to pay $108 for the product.
